comment: /**  * Retrieve the DataSource identified by the given name.  * @param dataSourceName the name of the DataSource  * @return the DataSource (never {@code null})  * @throws DataSourceLookupFailureException if the lookup failed  */
code: /**  * Retrieve the DataSource identified by the given name.  * @param dataSourceName the name of the DataSource  * @return the DataSource (never {@code null})  * @throws DataSourceLookupFailureException if the lookup failed  */ DataSource getDataSource(String dataSourceName) throws DataSourceLookupFailureException.
